title: Bug 33822Strange scrolling of native table
description: Bug 33822Strange scrolling of native table You have to scrollto the left to make them appear.
OB: N20030305 If you add a new entry to the task view, the native table is scrolledcompletely to the right, showing an area where there is no column. If you open the label decorator preferences, the table is scrolled to theright, not revealing the checkboxes to toggle decorators.
